alert.note: Alert for Baca (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued July 20 at 8:30PM MDT until July 20 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northeastern Baca County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 900 PM MDT. * At 830 PM MDT, a confirmed tornado was located near Vilas, or 9 miles east of Springfield, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Weather spotters confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Walsh and Vilas. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
